title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4106.2 - Misrepresentation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4106.2 - Misrepresentation

State Regulations

Any misrepresentation of a material fact concerning the
record of a horse entered at a licensed harness racing track shall be deemed a
violation of this Subchapter and subject the person or persons responsible
therefor to all the penalties of this act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4106.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
